data.meta_description: Rumors of a divorce between Abhishek Bachchan and Aishwarya Rai have intensified. The speculation began when the couple did not attend a recent high-
data.text:
Rumors of a divorce between Abhishek Bachchan and Aishwarya Rai have intensified. The speculation began when the couple did not attend a recent high-profile wedding together. Abhishek posed with his family, including Amitabh, Jaya, and his sister's family. Aishwarya arrived later with their daughter, Aaradhya.

Social Media Activity Raises Eyebrows

Following their separate appearances, Abhishek liked an Instagram post discussing rising divorce rates. The post read, "When love stops being easy," and talked about the challenges of separation. This interaction was quickly noticed by keen-eyed social media users, further fueling the rumors.

Public Absence and Ongoing Rumors

Abhishek and Aishwarya have not been seen together in public for some time. The latest wedding event, attended by many celebrities, highlighted their absence as a couple. The rumors of their separation have been circulating for a while and gained more attention with this recent incident.

Marriage and Family

Abhishek and Aishwarya got married on April 20, 2007. They welcomed their daughter, Aaradhya, on November 16, 2011. Despite the ongoing rumors, there has been no official confirmation from either party.

Abhishek's Upcoming Projects

On the professional front, Abhishek Bachchan is set to appear in the film "King," directed by Sujoy Ghosh. He will reportedly play a negative role alongside Shah Rukh Khan and Suhana Khan. Abhishek is also part of the cast for "Housefull 5," which features Akshay Kumar, Anil Kapoor, Nana Patekar, Riteish Deshmukh, and Chunky Pandey in key roles.

As the rumors continue to swirl, fans and followers await any official statements from Abhishek or Aishwarya regarding their relationship status.
